Home.h1: Buy and sell a car in Spain with diagnostics and car change in Alicante
Home.h2: Car sourcing, inspected used cars, and trade-in style car change with our own workshop
Home.introText: CLAN AUTO provides car buying support in Spain, helps sell used cars, and offers car change options using your current vehicle. We work with inspected cars and perform diagnostics and pre-purchase checks in our own workshop in Alicante.
Home.scenariosTitle: What would you like to do with your car?
Home.tradeText: Sell your current car and choose another with diagnostics.
